Package org.apache.struts2.tiles

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    I18NAttributeEvaluator  
    StrutsApplicationResource  
    StrutsAttributeEvaluator  
    StrutsFreeMarkerAttributeRenderer  
    StrutsPreparerFactory
    This is a basic ViewPreparer factory that uses ObjectFactory to create the ViewPreparer
    StrutsTilesAnnotationProcessor
    Processes tiles annotations to create Definitions and Attributes in a way as close to tiles.xml as possible.
    StrutsTilesContainerFactory
    Dedicated Struts factory to build Tiles container with support for: - Freemarker - I18N using Struts resource bundles - S2 ro access Struts' ValueStack - OGNL - EL If you need additional features create your own listener and factory, you can base on code from Tiles' CompleteAutoloadTilesContainerFactory
    StrutsTilesInitializer  
    StrutsTilesListener
    Listener used to automatically tie Tiles support into Struts
    StrutsTilesLocaleResolver  
    StrutsWildcardServletApplicationContext
